++ Useful Columns

UC refers to a principle of grid views in [Frontend]s to have useful fields or columns displayed.
    * EmergentUsefulness?

++Examples
    * XML file validation such as XHTML
    * Time remaining for a song or film
    * Viruses detected in email should be visible in email column
